attributes.review: wo'ah, earf, birming'am, fish n' chips... long ago, the fou' nations live togedah in ah'mony. then ev'ryfing changed when the IRA attacked.... only the avatah, mastah of all fou' elements could stop 'em but when the queen needed 'im most, 'e vanished. 100 yea's passed and me bruv and i found the new avatah. a fish n' chips bendah named aang. although 'is chipbendin' skills ah great, 'e still 'as a lo' to lea'n 'fore 'e's ready to save anyone m8.
attributes.title: The Avatar Intro But Its in a Cockney Accent

attributes.review: It’s really unfortunate. I downloaded the app to see how trump achieved his orange glaze that he calls skin. I’m black, but I want to be orange. I had to manually put the order in for 4 bags of Cheeto puff dust and when the guy came, he wouldn’t sell the bags to me unless I sent him feet pics. He stood there and kept asking to lick between my toes... who is this guy?
attributes.title: Cheeto dust and toe lickers

attributes.review: Okay so I got this app because I wanted to see what our lord and savior 🙏🏽 Bunker boy, oops 🥴 I mean Donald Trump was planning for the upcoming election. But when I opened the app it was nothing but garbage. Imagine my disappointment when I see nothing I opened the app and there was nothing. The only thing I saw was a giant picture of a clown🤡 oops I’m sorry 🥴 I mean Donald Trump. Peace and love 😜😝🧚🏽‍♀️💫✨
attributes.title: TRASH🤢🤮🤢

Oh, oh

Check me out, haha

attributes.title: *g A g*

attributes.review: so after my phone was glitching i deleted the app. my screen was black but still had sound. nothing i did would fix it but letting it sit for 30 minutes. what if i needed my phone at that time? your horrible app almost caused me danger and i notice while reading the update that it has your location even when your not using it. i hope that since i deleted it , no more problems will happen. take this app of the app store  . help lots of people not ave glitchy phones and track them . live😽laugh😹love😻
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: Trump is taking down a app that has helped many children called TikTok... this app has helped people make new friends, find love, helped get news out, and helped people with depression... since Trump is taking down TikTok(an app we love even tho it has to much drama) then we’ll take down this app! Have a nice day everyone ✨❤️
attributes.title: Gen Z

attributes.review: the cheeto aka our horrible president is banning tiktok and should stop cause we are unstoppable and you will not take away our app that actually makes us feel better and connecting with people around the world imagine how many jobs you’re taking away from people. snap back into reality and face your problems not trying to take them away by banning apps like grow up. you’re just mad you got your little feelings hurt cause we hurt your little rally and we’ll do it again, so face your problems not ban them. 🥱😉😊 thank you!
attributes.title: cheeto banning tiktok

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app is a joke and  a big Orange fat man popped up on my screen and was vote for me so I tossed my phone across my room then I took nap and the big orange man was in my dream so was like forget this nap and I went out side he was right there near my mailbox so I turned in to the flash and ran away. I have been traumatized by him he is EVERYWHERE IM SCARY SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME
attributes.title: This app is scary

attributes.review: okay so I love tiktok, but I wasnt appart of the whole “gen z“ take down the app thing. I geneually wanted to see what this app was about. But this app made my phone crash, it messed up a ton of apps. My phone kept shutting off and on. And the minute I deleted it everything went back to normal. #hateontrumpapp #savetiktok #tiktoklivesmatter
attributes.title: Remove the app

attributes.review: I’m sorry, but I downloaded this app because I genuinely wanted to know more about Trumps campaign, but the app took forever to download, and then forever to start. Maybe the developers were trying to model the app after his brain, but I wasn’t able to get any good information from it 💖💖
attributes.title: Really bad
